Tears

06 Nov 2012
  • I’m not sure
  • why streaming water
  • down a face
  • infers some
  • passionate emotion
  • but I can’t help
  • but wonder
  • if the mountain
  • feels the same way I do

/getting-intimate-with-nature /life-focus
